tagline: AI-powered dining concierge that helps you discover the perfect place to eat through natural language conversation.
publicDescription: Dice-Dine combines the intelligence of GPT with geospatial data to provide personalized, actionable restaurant recommendations. It features a conversational interface for expressing dining preferences, and plots curated results on an interactive map. Features include automatic location awareness, contextual 'roll-a-dice' randomizers, and a clean, minimalist UI.
